name: Rubber Ducks In The Sun
content: The ducks were very happy to be in the sun. Off in the distance some clouds were forming.

name: Rubber Ducks In The Rain
content: The rain came and swept away the rubber ducks with little resistance, as they are inanimate objects.

name: Rubber Ducks In A Cave
content: The ducks took refuge in a cave because in this story they're sentient.
